name: trowl
description: An ultra-lightweight, standalone, masonry-style grid library

scripts.build: npm run babel && npm run browserify && npm run uglify && npm run cleanup
scripts.babel: babel index.js -o index.es6.js && babel example/demo.js -o example/demo.es6.js --no-comments
scripts.uglify: uglifyjs index.dist.js -o index.min.js -c -m && npm run browserifyDemo && npm run uglifyDemo
scripts.cleanup: rm index.es6.js && rm index.dist.js && rm example/demo.es6.js && rm example/demo.dist.js

author: krazyjakee
